Detailed Description

Class that models a drop down object from the chisimba core modules.

It basically an interface class between the hosportal module and the chisimba core modules. This creates less dependancy on chisimba and increases flexibility and maintainability. This drop down object lets you create a drop down box with options. Once you have selected an option. You can pass its name as a parameter so you can use the getParam(variable to be stored,parameter) to do what you like with that selected option in other entities.

Author:
Salman Noor
MIU Intern
School of Electrical Engineering, WITS Unversity
Version:
0.68
Date:
May 3, 2010
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this class

createNewObjectFromModule ( $  name_of_drop_down = 'noOfMessagesDropDown'  ) 

Creates an object from the chisimba core modules.

Parameters:
name_of_drop_down A string with default value noOfMessagesDropDown.
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this member function.
Returns:
A new drop down object with a specific name to be used.

EditModule (  ) 

In the future if required, this drop down module can be modified or augmented using this member function.

Currently it is not implemented.

Reimplemented from chisimba_modules_handler.

Standard constructor that sets up this class. The contrustor is creating the class's private data members.

The object is still has not been instatiated yet. We need to name this object so we use the new operator in the createNewObjectFromModule member function.

insertOptionIntoDropDown ( $  name_of_option,
$  label_for_option 
)

Member function to insert items in the drop down object.

Parameters:
name_of_option A string. Can be used as a parameter in other entities.
label_for_option A string. The string will be displayed as an option.
Warning:
Do NOT pass variable types as parameters that are not specified in this member function.
Returns:
An inserted option in the drop down object.

Returns a member function from the drop down class of the chisimba core modules.

If you call this method without any arguments, you would not be setting anything.

Definition at line 78 of file dropdown_module_class_inc.php.

setDefaultOptionForDropDown ( $  default_option  ) 

Member function to set the default option for the drop down box.

Parameters:
default_option A string. This argument is the same the $name_of_option from the insertOptionIntoDropDown member function.
Warning:
Do NOT pass option that is not already stored in the drop down box.
Returns:
An default selected option in the drop down object.

Returns a member function from the drop down class of the chisimba core modules.

When the drop down is display. It will show the default option always unless the user changes it.

If you call this method without any arguments, you would not be setting anything.

Definition at line 92 of file dropdown_module_class_inc.php.

showBuildDropDownMenu (  ) 

Method to display the drop down box.

Returns:
A member function from the drop down class of the chisimba core modules.

Once the drop down object has been completely modelled,

this can allow you to display it.

Field Documentation

$objDropDownMenu [private]

Private data member of dropdown form_module that stores an object of another class.

This class is composed of one object from the dropdown class in the html elements core module of chisimba. This object models one drop down box object.
